item.title: Peacock Feathers Are Stunning. They Can Also Emit Laser Beams
item.description: Scientists hope their plumage project could someday lead to biocompatible lasers that could safely be embedded in the human body.

item.title: Is Roman concrete more sustainable? It’s complicated.
item.description: Roman concrete produces as much, if not more, CO2 as modern concrete, fewer air pollutants.

item.title: Making Roman concrete produces as much CO2 as modern concrete
item.description: Roman concrete produces as much, if not more, CO2 as modern concrete, fewer air pollutants.

item.title: This aerogel and some sun could make saltwater drinkable
item.description: Previous aerogels didn’t work on a scale that was large enough to matter.
